summary.span: Zarządza stan widoku Projektant działań i jej podstawowych elementów modelu.

span.span: Manages the view state of the activity designer and its underlying model items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implementuje i generuje właściwości tekstu, która przechowuje oraz pobiera wartość ze skojarzonym formantem widoku stanu.Implements and generates a text property that stores and retrieves its value from an associated control’s view state.

span.span: Records the current setting of the item represented by the specified key so that it is available for an undo operation and then stores the item represented by the specified key in the view state of the specified model item.
